section:
Data Structures Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:dec_datetime
The date/time format used by Primary Volume Descriptors dir_datetime
The date/time format used by directory records directory
A collection of directory records which together make a single directory directory_record
Directory.h - the directory and directory_record datatypes and their associated functions file_flags
File_flags.h - file_flags data type and its associated functions index_entry
A file entry in an index_file index_file
Contains all the indicies within an INDEX.00# file path_table
A collection of path_table_entries path_table_entry
Path_table.h - the path_table and path_table_entry data types and their related functions volume_descriptor
A volume descriptor volume_descriptor_data
The data section of a primary volume descriptor
